attributes.action: grant full powers of arrest to Private Investigators in order to track down and apprehend Bail Fugitives
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The police in the UK are stretched to their breaking point.  I feel that it makes common sense to utilise Private Investigators to undertake the role of armed Fugitive Recovery Agents (Bounty Hunters) to trace and arrest Bail Jumpers thereby alleviating the pressure on the Police Service.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
